name: GreyNoise for SOAR
description: This app provides investigative capabilities using the GreyNoise plugin

on_poll_query.description: GNQL query to use for the on poll action

on_poll_size.description: The number of results to return for the interval/schedule poll

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using the supplied configuration
actions.verbose: Tests the connection to the paid GreyNoise API.

actions.description: Lookup IP using GreyNoise API Quick Check Endpoint

example_values: The IP has never been observed scanning the Internet
The IP has been observed by the GreyNoise sensor network

actions.description: Lookup IP using GreyNoise's RIOT endpoint
actions.verbose: RIOT identifies IPs from known benign services and organizations that commonly cause false positives in network security and threat intelligence products. The collection of IPs in RIOT is continually curated and verified to provide accurate results.

example_values: Global domain name system (DNS) resolution service.
Public DNS services are used as alternatives to ISP's name servers. You may see devices on your network communicating with Public DNS over port XX/TCP or XX/UDP to resolve DNS lookups.

actions.description: Get full GreyNoise reputation and context for a specific IP
actions.verbose: Get more information about a given IP address. Returns time ranges, IP metadata (network owner, ASN, reverse DNS pointer, country), associated actors, activity tags, raw port scan, and web request information.

actions.description: Use the GreyNoise Query Language to run a query
actions.verbose: Please refer to <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer" href="https://docs.greynoise.io/reference/gnqlquery-1">https://docs.greynoise.io/reference/gnqlquery-1/a> for further information.

size.description: The number of results to return (warning: returning over 1000 results may degrade widget performance)

actions.description: Lookup IPs using GreyNoise API Multi Quick Check Endpoint (comma-separated, limit 500 per request)
actions.verbose: Returns quick check information for multiple IPs.

ips.description: IPs to query, comma-separated list allowed

example_values: The IP has never been observed scanning the Internet
The IP has been observed by the GreyNoise sensor network

actions.description: Get details on a specific GNQL query

container_count.description: Maximum number of results to return for the on poll action

actions.description: Lookup IP using GreyNoise's free community endpoint
actions.verbose: The Community API provides community users with a free tool to query IPs in the GreyNoise dataset and retrieve a subset of the full IP context data returned by the IP Lookup API.

example_values: You have hit your daily rate limit of 100 requests per day. Please create a free account or upgrade your plan at https://greynoise.io/pricing.

actions.description: Lookup Similar internet scanner IP using GreyNoise's IP Similarity tool
actions.verbose: The GreyNoise IP Similarity tool allows for analysts to identify IP addresses within the GreyNoise internet scanning dataset that are using a similar scanning profile.

ip.description: IP to find Similar IPs for

min_score.description: The minimum score to return matches for, recommended is 90.

limit.description: The maximum number of similar IP results to return.

actions.description: Lookup Similar internet scanner IP using GreyNoise's IP Similarity tool
actions.verbose: The GreyNoise IP Similarity tool allows for analysts to identify IP addresses within the GreyNoise internet scanning dataset that are using a similar scanning profile.

days.description: The maximum number of days to pull timeline data

limit.description: The maximum number of results to return.
